channel.title: Comments on: Lemon Tasting Plate and the MasterChef Cookbook

item.title: By: Design babe Brisbane
item.dc:creator: Design babe Brisbane
item.description: oh wow i didint know that this book was areal recipe book..very interesting i will have to have alook..thank you very mcuh for sharing
item.content:encoded: oh wow i didint know that this book was areal recipe book..very interesting i will have to have alook..thank you very mcuh for sharing

item.title: By: Karen Ng
item.dc:creator: Karen Ng
item.description: You've sold me on the MC cookbook! Must have a look for any Boxing Day book sales and pick up a copy, if only to drool over the beautiful creations.
item.content:encoded: You’ve sold me on the MC cookbook! Must have a look for any Boxing Day book sales and pick up a copy, if only to drool over the beautiful creations.

item.title: By: Heavenly Housewife
item.dc:creator: Heavenly Housewife
item.description: What a great book, and a fabulous recipe. Those little cupcakes look awesome! I want one.
item.content:encoded: What a great book, and a fabulous recipe. Those little cupcakes look awesome! I want one.

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: That masterchef cookbook actually looks so good. You've alreayd tried so many of the recipes, but I'm sure you'll try your hand at alot more. Great cupcake by the way!!
item.content:encoded: That masterchef cookbook actually looks so good. You’ve alreayd tried so many of the recipes, but I’m sure you’ll try your hand at alot more. Great cupcake by the way!!

item.title: By: Y
item.dc:creator: Y
item.description: Wow, I remember you'd cooked a few MC recipes, but didn't realise how many exactly! Your lemon butterfly cupcake looks very tasty.
item.content:encoded: Wow, I remember you’d cooked a few MC recipes, but didn’t realise how many exactly! Your lemon butterfly cupcake looks very tasty.

item.title: By: Barbara Harris
item.dc:creator: Barbara Harris
item.description: I remember Julies lemon cupcakes on the show. They sounded delicious. The lemon plate would have been a great entry for A Taste Of Yellow :)
item.content:encoded: I remember Julies lemon cupcakes on the show. They sounded delicious. The lemon plate would have been a great entry for A Taste Of Yellow ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Barabara Bakes
item.dc:creator: Barabara Bakes
item.description: I haven't ever had lemon cream. Such a great idea! I love lemon. The cupcakes sound great!
item.content:encoded: I haven’t ever had lemon cream. Such a great idea! I love lemon. The cupcakes sound great!

item.title: By: Conor @ HoldtheBeef
item.dc:creator: Conor @ HoldtheBeef
item.description: I also didn't realise the cookbook was this comprehensive. Love your dishes :)
item.content:encoded: I also didn’t realise the cookbook was this comprehensive. Love your dishes ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Ellie
item.dc:creator: Ellie
item.description: The dessert you made is absolutely beautiful!! I am a big fan of masterchef too :)
item.content:encoded: The dessert you made is absolutely beautiful!! I am a big fan of masterchef too ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: lisa (dandysugar)
item.dc:creator: lisa (dandysugar)
item.description: Beautiful dessert! I love lemon in just about anything! These look amazing.
item.content:encoded: Beautiful dessert! I love lemon in just about anything! These look amazing.
